history.narrative: Law 2-13 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-35, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 22, 1977 and April 5, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor in May 2, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-35 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
